description: Information users can provide when describing their Cloud Run job

function_name.description: Name or identifier for your function

memory_gib.description: How much memory your function needs (in GiB)
memory_gib.notes: If using GPU, minimum is 16 GiB

execution_time_estimate_s.description: How long your function typically runs (in seconds)

data_input_gb.description: Size of input data downloaded from storage (in GB)

data_output_gb.description: Size of output data uploaded to storage (in GB)

gpu_required.description: Whether your function needs a GPU (NVIDIA L4)
gpu_required.notes: GPUs available in: Iowa, Virginia, Belgium, Netherlands

urgency.description: When does this job need to run?

options.flexible: Can wait for lower-carbon time windows

deadline.description: Latest time the job must complete (if urgency is flexible)

priority.description: What should be optimized when choosing a region?

batch_processing.description: Large batch job, can wait for low-carbon window

gpu_job.description: AI inference with GPU, run immediately
